nodes.text: The Unassailable was a starship in service of the Galactic Empire shortly before the Galactic Civil War. Prior to the Battle of Scarif, General Sotorus Ramda of the Scarif Deployment requested that two squadrons of TIE/sk x1 experimental air superiority fighters loaned to the vessel be returned to him, so that there could be effective patrols and proper training for TIE fighter pilots on Scarif.
